item.title: Extracting Audio From Video With FFmpeg
item.description: Just a few moments ago I needed to extract the audio component out of a video file into some type of standalone audio file, like .mp3. Since I’ve been working with Audacity to record audio, I figured maybe it had some capability for ripping it out of video. My initial searches gave me results like this which quickly made it clear that while this is technically possible, it requires some add-ins that I didn’t really want to mess around with.
